DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate long-term treatment with ZomactonÂ® for pituitary short stature in children with insufficient growth hormone production and/or short stature caused by Turner syndrome.
DOC.brief_title: Online Surveillance of Treatment of Children With Growth Hormone Deficiency With ZOMACTON
DOC.criteria: therapeutic need according to SPC written informed consent contraindications according to SPC
